# Setup
```{r setup, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results="hide"}
library("tidyverse") # general data manipulation

phenomics_meta_data <- readRDS(file = "phenomics_meta_data.RDS")
View(phenomics_meta_data)
```


# Top 50 most common phenotypes
```{r}
phenotype_counts <- phenomics_meta_data %>% 
  summarise(across(.cols = everything(), 
                   .fns = ~.x %>% is.na() %>% `!` %>%  sum())) %>% 
  as.vector() %>% 
  unlist() %>% base::sort(decreasing = T)

phenotype_counts
```

# Search for phenotype
```{r}
my_string <- "lep"
phenotype_counts %>% 
  setNames(names(.), .) %>% 
  str_detect(my_string) %>% 
  phenotype_counts[.]

```
